prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Organ, Guitar, Synth Pad, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Organ, Guitar, and Synth Pad, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Organ, Guitar, and Synth Pad, omitting Drums.

Style 3:
No Drums are present in this song, but it does include Bass, Organ, Guitar, and Synth Pad.
